user.title: Configure Energy Manager
user.description: Select the entities for your EcoFlow battery system.

data_description.grid_power_sensor: Sensor showing current grid import (positive) / export (negative) in watts.
data_description.solar_power_sensor: Sensor showing current solar production in watts.
data_description.battery_soc_sensor: Sensor showing battery state of charge in percent.
data_description.max_charge_power_number: Number entity to set max AC charging power.
data_description.custom_load_power_number: Number entity to set custom load (feed-in) power.

data_description.feed_in_mode: Dynamic adjusts feed-in to match consumption. Static uses a fixed value.
data_description.feed_in_static_power: Fixed feed-in power when using static mode.
data_description.min_battery_soc: Stop discharging when battery reaches this SOC.
data_description.max_grid_feed_in_power: Maximum power to feed into the home.
data_description.max_grid_import_solar_charge: Maximum grid import allowed during solar charging (0 = pure solar).
data_description.update_interval: How often the manager evaluates and adjusts (seconds).
data_description.deadband: Power deviation threshold before adjusting (prevents oscillation).
data_description.charge_power_step: Step size for charge power adjustments (battery hardware constraint).
data_description.min_dwell_time: Minimum time to stay in a state before transitioning (seconds).
